title: So glad the circus animals playing akali support dont get banned
body: Because naughty words are so much worse, right?

replies.body: Champions aren't locked to a specific role, so there is no reading someone would be banned just for playing Akali support.
yeah, because akali support is totally not a troll pick.

It's not.

There is literally no such thing as a "troll pick". They literally can't troll until the game starts.

Now if they say they're going to troll with it, that's another story. But picking off meta is not punishable at all.

So tell me, what does an assassin like akali without any gold income contribute to the team? 

It's easy to toot the horn of "off meta isn't punishable" all you want, but when you dont actually contribute anything to the team by virtue of your pick, it's trolling. The game is now a 4v5.

Well given the Akali built support items early, didn't steal cs, placed more than twice as many wards as you did and lets not pretend your team losing 46 kills to 13 was all his fault. Your team lost mid, bot and were out jungled, having a meta support wasn't going to change anything.

Yeah, built a support item but literally cant contribute anything until level 6 (even then it's a low damage assassin). So now it's 2v1 bot and the entire lane is pretty much lost barring constant jungle pressure. Every lane may have lost, but his picking akali did not make it possible to win bot, especially since I hadn't picked a self reliant adc.

Well, Akali could probably benefit from _Spellthief's Edge_ as a long-term option for gold gain as it involves gaining gold through attacking people, although _Relic Shield_ could also work due to her being melee and being able to easily proc its effects (primarily for short-term lane sustain).

As for what she contributes; **Kill pressure. _Lots_ of kill pressure.** Especially when she hits level 6, she can be an extremely dangerous thing to have, especially if the bottom laner has even a modicum of CC - light or hard.

She is like Draven and Caitlyn - a constant threat that is unduly hard to put down, especially when she gets ahead. And while she lacks CC of her own, she sure as shit ain't the first of her kind. Veigar, Brand, Zyra, Zoe - all of them are kill pressure-focused Supports.

It doesn't take a rocket scientist to know what Akali contributes to a team - which, by the way, the amount of kills she'd be getting would undoubtedly cover the gold income issue presented by playing Support.

That's my point though. An akali without gold/items doesn't have kill pressure. She will pretty much do the same damage as a braum or leona without any of the other benefits involved. Plus when the other team doesn't troll pick, their support will contribute something like CC which shuts her down pretty easily.
